text: Georges Boillot in his EX3 The Peugeot EX3 was a Peugeot race car c. 1912–1914 with a four-cylinder engine. The car driven by Dario Resta won the 1915 Vanderbilt Cup in San Francisco, California and the United States Grand Prix. ==External links== * 1915 Vanderbilt Cup ==References== EX3
title: Peugeot EX3
